TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed CipherMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the block cipher mode to use for encryption.

span.span: Specifies the block cipher mode to use for encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區塊的加密演算法加密資料以區塊為單位，而非一次的單一位元組。Block cipher algorithms encrypt data in block units, rather than a single byte at a time. 最常見的區塊大小是 8 位元組。The most common block size is 8 bytes. 每個區塊的處理時有很大，因為區塊密碼會提供較高層級的安全性比串流式密碼。Because each block is heavily processed, block ciphers provide a higher level of security than stream ciphers. 不過，通常比串流式密碼的放慢執行區塊的加密演算法。However, block cipher algorithms tend to execute more slowly than stream ciphers. 區塊密碼的每個區塊，使用相同的加密演算法。Block ciphers use the same encryption algorithm for each block. 因為這個緣故，純文字區塊一定會傳回相同的加密文字加密使用相同的索引鍵和演算法。Because of this, a block of plain text will always return the same cipher text when encrypted with the same key and algorithm. 因為此行為可以用來破解加密，加密模式會引進修改加密程序，根據先前區塊加密回饋。Because this behavior can be used to crack a cipher, cipher modes are introduced that modify the encryption process based on feedback from earlier block encryptions. 產生的加密會提供比簡單的區塊加密更高的安全性層級。The resulting encryption provides a higher level of security than a simple block encryption.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode CBC = int32(1)

summary.span: The Cipher Block Chaining () mode introduces feedback.

span.span: The Cipher Block Chaining () mode introduces feedback.

summary.span: Before each plain text block is encrypted, it is combined with the cipher text of the previous block by a bitwise exclusive OR operation.

span.span: Before each plain text block is encrypted, it is combined with the cipher text of the previous block by a bitwise exclusive OR operation.

summary.span: This ensures that even if the plain text contains many identical blocks, they will each encrypt to a different cipher text block.

span.span: This ensures that even if the plain text contains many identical blocks, they will each encrypt to a different cipher text block.

summary.span: The initialization vector is combined with the first plain text block by a bitwise exclusive OR operation before the block is encrypted.

span.span: The initialization vector is combined with the first plain text block by a bitwise exclusive OR operation before the block is encrypted.

summary.span: If a single bit of the cipher text block is mangled, the corresponding plain text block will also be mangled.

span.span: If a single bit of the cipher text block is mangled, the corresponding plain text block will also be mangled.

summary.span: In addition, a bit in the subsequent block, in the same position as the original mangled bit, will be mangled.

span.span: In addition, a bit in the subsequent block, in the same position as the original mangled bit, will be mangled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode CFB = int32(4)

summary.span: The Cipher Feedback () mode processes small increments of plain text into cipher text, instead of processing an entire block at a time.

span.span: The Cipher Feedback () mode processes small increments of plain text into cipher text, instead of processing an entire block at a time.

summary.span: This mode uses a shift register that is one block in length and is divided into sections.

span.span: This mode uses a shift register that is one block in length and is divided into sections.

summary.span: For example, if the block size is 8 bytes, with one byte processed at a time, the shift register is divided into eight sections.

span.span: For example, if the block size is 8 bytes, with one byte processed at a time, the shift register is divided into eight sections.

summary.span: If a bit in the cipher text is mangled, one plain text bit is mangled and the shift register is corrupted.

span.span: If a bit in the cipher text is mangled, one plain text bit is mangled and the shift register is corrupted.

summary.span: This results in the next several plain text increments being mangled until the bad bit is shifted out of the shift register.

span.span: This results in the next several plain text increments being mangled until the bad bit is shifted out of the shift register.

summary.span: The default feedback size can vary by algorithm, but is typically either 8 bits or the number of bits of the block size.

span.span: The default feedback size can vary by algorithm, but is typically either 8 bits or the number of bits of the block size.

summary.span: You can alter the number of feedback bits by using the property.

span.span: You can alter the number of feedback bits by using the property.

summary.span: Algorithms that support CFB use this property to set the feedback.

span.span: Algorithms that support CFB use this property to set the feedback.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode CTS = int32(5)

summary.span: The Cipher Text Stealing () mode handles any length of plain text and produces cipher text whose length matches the plain text length.

span.span: The Cipher Text Stealing () mode handles any length of plain text and produces cipher text whose length matches the plain text length.

summary.span: This mode behaves like the mode for all but the last two blocks of the plain text.

span.span: This mode behaves like the mode for all but the last two blocks of the plain text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode ECB = int32(2)

summary.span: The Electronic Codebook () mode encrypts each block individually.

span.span: The Electronic Codebook () mode encrypts each block individually.

summary.span: Any blocks of plain text that are identical and in the same message, or that are in a different message encrypted with the same key, will be transformed into identical cipher text blocks.

span.span: Any blocks of plain text that are identical and in the same message, or that are in a different message encrypted with the same key, will be transformed into identical cipher text blocks.

summary.span: **Important**: This mode is not recommended because it opens the door for multiple security exploits.

span.span: **Important**: This mode is not recommended because it opens the door for multiple security exploits.

summary.span: If the plain text to be encrypted contains substantial repetition, it is feasible for the cipher text to be broken one block at a time.

span.span: If the plain text to be encrypted contains substantial repetition, it is feasible for the cipher text to be broken one block at a time.

summary.span: It is also possible to use block analysis to determine the encryption key.

span.span: It is also possible to use block analysis to determine the encryption key.

summary.span: Also, an active adversary can substitute and exchange individual blocks without detection, which allows blocks to be saved and inserted into the stream at other points without detection.

span.span: Also, an active adversary can substitute and exchange individual blocks without detection, which allows blocks to be saved and inserted into the stream at other points without detection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode OFB = int32(3)

summary.span: The Output Feedback () mode processes small increments of plain text into cipher text instead of processing an entire block at a time.

span.span: The Output Feedback () mode processes small increments of plain text into cipher text instead of processing an entire block at a time.

summary.span: This mode is similar to ; the only difference between the two modes is the way that the shift register is filled.

span.span: This mode is similar to ; the only difference between the two modes is the way that the shift register is filled.

summary.span: If a bit in the cipher text is mangled, the corresponding bit of plain text will be mangled.

span.span: If a bit in the cipher text is mangled, the corresponding bit of plain text will be mangled.

summary.span: However, if there are extra or missing bits from the cipher text, the plain text will be mangled from that point on.

span.span: However, if there are extra or missing bits from the cipher text, the plain text will be mangled from that point on.
